name: Frontier Smash
description:
Frontier Smash is an isometric action game taking place on an alien planet ripe with valuable crystal resources. You, as a gun for hire, must clear out hostile alien life and protect robot laborers as they harvest the resources for glorious corporate development. Armed with your grenade launcher and laser machete fight back against the creatures of alien worlds.

Credits:

Game Designer, Level Designer, Producer - Ben Smith 

Programmer - Conner Howard

3D Modeler/Textures - Amir Ibrahim

 2D Artist and Audio - Kevyn San Antonio

System Requirements

  1. Windows Specs: Processor Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U CPU @ 1.60GHz 1.80 GHz
  2.  Installed RAM 12.0 GB 
  3. System type 64-bit operating system

Installation instructions for you game

 1. Download the zip folder 

2. Extract Files onto desktop 

3. Open folder and run the .exe

4. Smash!
